betterquesting:10.desc:8: Craft an ME Controller! Every normal ME Cable can carry 8 channels, and every dense ME Cable can carry 32 channels. One channel is used when you connect a machine that requires information about your ME System (what items are inside). The ME Controller is the heart of the ME System, because each side of each block provides 32 channels, and it can be built into a multiblock such that no ME Controller block is touching more than 5 other Controller blocks (for example a hollow rectangular shape works). Energy can be provided by just attaching an Energy Acceptor to the side of the Controller. I recommend using multiple colored dense cables to output from the controller, since those don't connect to eachother.
betterquesting:10.name:8: The heart of an ME System
